title: School Profile banner carousel using curated gallery media

requirements.summary: Enhance SchoolProfileBanner to render an interactive, accessible photo carousel matching the SchoolCard media carousel behavior while preserving existing overlay and content.
acceptanceCriteria: When multiple banner images are available, the banner shows one image at a time and provides accessible Previous/Next controls (with English aria-labels) to cycle through images.
When only one banner image is available, the banner renders a single image with no carousel controls.
The banner continues to display the existing gradient overlay, school name, location, and the optional “Inquire Now” button exactly as before.
Keyboard interaction is supported for cycling slides (e.g., left/right arrow behavior consistent with the SchoolCard carousel).
If an image fails to load, the banner shows a graceful fallback state instead of breaking layout.

file_operations.description: Update the banner API to accept multiple images (e.g., an array of {src, alt} or similar) and implement carousel behavior aligned with the existing SchoolCard carousel: one slide visible at a time, show Previous/Next controls only when there are multiple slides, support left/right arrow key cycling, and keep the existing gradient overlay + school name/location + optional “Inquire Now” button unchanged. Add per-slide image error handling to render a non-breaking fallback UI when an image fails to load (e.g., icon/placeholder). Keep all new aria-labels in English.

requirements.summary: Pass curated gallery images into SchoolProfileBanner from SchoolDetailPage with a fallback to the existing default banner asset.
acceptanceCriteria: For schools with curated gallery images, the School Profile banner uses those images as the carousel slides (not just the first image).
For schools without curated gallery images, the School Profile banner uses the existing default banner image (`/assets/generated/school-profile-banner.dim_1600x420.png`).
No backend changes are required to support the banner carousel.

file_operations.description: Change SchoolDetailPage to pass the full list from getCuratedGalleryImages(school.id) into SchoolProfileBanner (to populate all carousel slides). When curated images are absent/empty, do not pass curated slides so SchoolProfileBanner falls back to its existing default static banner image (/assets/generated/school-profile-banner.dim_1600x420.png). Ensure no layout-breaking changes to the School Detail page.

Adjust prop handling to accept the curated gallery image list from SchoolDetailPage and build the banner slide list from it, with a sensible fallback to the existing default banner image when no curated images are provided.

requirements.summary: Ensure all newly introduced accessibility labels and fallback messaging for the banner carousel are English-only.
acceptanceCriteria: All newly introduced aria-labels and any visible fallback text added for the banner carousel are in English.
No existing user-facing text is changed to a non-English language.

file_operations.description: Audit and enforce English-only strings for any newly added aria-labels (e.g., Previous photo/Next photo/Go to photo N) and any visible fallback text used when an image fails to load, without changing existing non-accessibility user-facing copy.
